settings.hero_subtitle: Discover our handcrafted collection of premium Kentucky bourbon, distilled with tradition and aged to perfection.

settings.title: Featured Whiskeys
settings.description: Discover our exceptional collection of handcrafted bourbon and whiskey, each bottle a testament to Kentucky's finest distilling traditions.

Founder and Master Distiller Stephen Beam and the team at Limestone Branch Distillery collaborated with the blending team at Ross & Squibb Distillery to create this commemorative 10th anniversary release. For the first time, barrels from Indiana and Kentucky distilleries were blended for this unique expression featuring aromas of vanilla, oak, and citrus.

settings.product_title: Lux Row Small Batch PX Sherry Cask Finished
settings.description: Extraordinary handpicked barrels featuring "ryed" Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey. Expertly blended in small batches and finished in PX Sherry casks for a uniquely elevated flavor featuring dried figs, dates, grape syrup, candied fruit, spice, roasted coffee, and dark chocolate.

settings.title: A Legacy of Excellence
settings.text:
Founded on generations of Kentucky bourbon tradition, our distillery combines time-honored techniques with innovative craftsmanship. Every bottle we produce tells a story of dedication, patience, and an unwavering commitment to quality.

From the limestone-filtered water to the hand-selected grains, each element is carefully chosen to create exceptional spirits worthy of the Yellowstone name.
